title: Customer Experience Practical Competency Enhancement: Short-Intensive Special Education Introduction Course Based on Flipped Learning

context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can explain the concept of inclusive education and propose at least two practical strategies applicable to real classroom settings.
Learners can design a three-stage self-directed learning strategy tailored to the learning characteristics of students with special needs.
Learners can analyze potential problem situations when instructing students with disabilities and demonstrate solutions through role-playing.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
